title: Niko Sirmpilatze
text:
Thanks for stopping by my little corner of the internet!
Iâ€™m a London-based neuroscientist and research software engineer dedicated to developing free, Open Source tools for studying brains and the behaviours they produce. My background in medicine and a PhD in neuroimaging have left me with a passion for neuroanatomy, and especially brain atlases.
I am deeply committed to promoting open, collaborative, and reproducible science. I find joy in dancing to jazz music and in failing to play woodwind instruments.
